articles.description: The gross bad loan ratio of banks, which stood at 7.5% as of 30 September, could almost double to 14.8% under a severe stress scenario, RBI warned on Monday in its semi-annual Financial Stability Report
articles.content: Banks and financials: Indian banks bad loan ratio could rise to 13.5% under the baseline stress scenario by September, the highest in more than 22 years. The gross bad loan ratio of banks, which stoo… [+2779 chars]

articles.title: Joe Biden Receives Second Dose Of COVID-19 Vaccine - NDTV
articles.description: US President-elect Joe Biden on Monday received his second Covid-19 shot, and said that getting vaccines into people's arms would be a "number one priority" for his incoming administration.
articles.content:
US President-elect Joe Biden emphasized the need to continue social distancing and mask wearing.
Washington: US President-elect Joe Biden on Monday received his second Covid-19 shot, and said that g… [+1759 chars]

articles.title: 'I was on top of the world' says Captain Zoya Aggarwal on landing Air India flight with first all-woman crew - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As AI-176 landed at the Kempegowda International Airport here and the crew members walked to the lounge, a huge crowd of people gave a rousing reception for scripting history with the about 17-hour journey, the longest flight by the national carrier or any ot…
articles.content: "I was on top of the world" said an elated Captain Zoya Aggarwal, who headed the four-member all-woman cockpit crew that flew into Indian aviation history on Monday, landing the San Francisco-Bengalu… [+3664 chars]

articles.title: "Short Notice, Different Time Zone": Pfizer On Delay In Vaccine Approval - NDTV
articles.description: US pharma giant Pfizer, whose Covid vaccine has yet be approved, told NDTV on Monday that it had been "unable to participate in previous meetings (to present safety and efficacy data) due to extremely short notice" and time zone differences
articles.content:
The Pfizer vaccine was developed in association with German company BioNTech (Representational)
